x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.solution_proposal:
How do you envision the ideal solution to this  problem?

 

Which ServiceNow products or capabilities would be used?

A CSDM-aligned model that tracks IT assets across their lifecycle — from procurement to decommission. It leverages ITSM for incident tracking, SAM for license compliance, and CMDB for relationships.

 

Are there any technical dependencies for the proposed solution?

  • ITSM, CMDB, CSDM, SAM/HAM
  • Integration with Finance Management
  • Enterprise Architecture

 

What challenges would you foresee in implementing this idea?

Data normalization across multiple asset sources.
